title: Being Human !!!
content:
Before I have my say, I want to ask u something...

Why is it that today we have to get horrendously logical even when we want to help somebody??? isn't humanity still alive??? why not...

ARE WE STILL HUMAN???

ARE WE BEING HUMAN???

ARE WE REALLY ALIVE???

Why is it that today we have to get horrendously logical even when we want to help somebody??? isn't humanity still alive??? why not...

 

My heart aches in writing this but at 19, a person was as soft as a petal with a million dreams and one of them 'being human till the end'...at 20, that every person feels like he/she is stone cold and has a heart as hard as a diamond...what do you expect that innocent person to say when his/her hair turn all grey and more so will by then, there would be blues flowing through his heart instead of blood???

 

Why does our environment , our system lets a petite mind feel that his humanitarian qualities better go n sleep instead of being awake and ready to take the world hands-on????why we can't we just do what our heart feels at least in emotional issues at this age at least...we need to form an India whose foundations are on the basis of a human nature....we need to make India an assimilation of loving hearts that beat together...

 

Develop yourself and the nation but amidst this all, through technological advancements, structural upliftments, societal ethos...its high time for us to "BE HUMAN"...

 

Let's MAKE INDIA KNOWN FOR WHAT DOESN'T EXIST IN MOST PARTS OF THE WORLD N WHERE INDIA TOPS THE LIST SINCE EVER...OUR LOVE,PASSION,EMOTIONS,CARE,CONCERN.....OUR HUMANITARIAN CONCERNS!!!

 

IT'S ALL ABOUT BEING HUMAN GUYZ...LETZ BE HUMAN!!!

Parul thinks . . . Parul says . . .

courtesy: Parul Kaushik
